description: An instance of a plugin configuration.
title: PluginConfigurationConfig

___options.description: The options of this instance, specific and different for each plugin.
___options.title: Options

___events.description: Events to react to, specific to each plugin.
___events.title: Events

___actions.description: A list of actions associated to this plugin.
___actions.title: Actions

___data.description: The eventual data associated to the plugin, specific to each plugin.
___data.title: Data
